overview:
Kenny Lum is the Co-Founder and Marketing Director for LIFEmee, which is a new life management tool that has just been released in September 2009.

Kenny has 10 years work experience in a large Japanese corporation as well as a smaller Japanese company dealing with various customers from all walks of life.

This valuable work experience has prepared him to do business in any country and under any circumstances. By learning to understand how different cultures do business and manage assets he decided to take what he had learned and produce a homepage that allowed people from all over the world to manage all aspects of their life online.

His goal was to develop an easy-to-use, convenient way to connect people worldwide, who are interested in business as well as asset management. With these important common interests they would be able to network more efficiently, monitor their life and also realize their financial and career goals in a shorter period of time.
